mapper.sql: tenant_bind_id AS "tenantBindId", tenant_id AS "tenantId", user_id AS "userId", display AS "display", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select
from sys_tenant_bind where 1 = 1
and tenant_bind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.tenantBindId},'%')
and tenant_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.tenantId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
